cleaned_text: From crystal shops, cafes, and trendy meditation studios to clothing brands, festivals, and retreats focused on well-being, Los Angeles knows wellness, and it knows it well. The city is marked by its avocado-eating, juice-craving, toned-up, blissed-out locals. Clean eating, superfoods, alternative exercise, and positive energy are no strangers here.
